ecom-2-pack-sampler-f-s-product.headingtext_r9nmq9ye07q_html: CLAIM YOUR FREE 2 Pack Sampler  | NO SUBSCRIPTION REQUIRED
ecom-2-pack-sampler-f-s-product.textcontent_s8w6osk7aro_html:
Unlock Your Flow with Troov Energy!
Our non-carbonated performance tea, made with 100% plant-based ingredients, is designed to invigorate your senses and help you find your flow.
And here‚Äôs the exciting part: we‚Äôre giving 100 lucky individuals the chance to claim a 2-Pack Sampler absolutely FREE! It‚Äôs our way of making the switch to Troov Energy easy and delightful. Cheers to energizing moments!
ecom-2-pack-sampler-f-s-product.textcontent_85h5ftloizn_html: Simply cover the $7.99 shipping costs, and your 2-Pack Sampler of Troov Energy will be on its way to you. Enjoy those energizing sips! üåøüåüüéÅ
ecom-2-pack-sampler-f-s-product.textcontent_9qbhchckp6v_html: No Subscription Required | Just Pay Shipping
ecom-2-pack-sampler-f-s-product.textcontent_buvyv6c1ldq_html: TROOV is an all-natural, plant-based, ready-to-enjoy, drink designed to help you find your true groove over and over again‚Äîwithout the crash.
ecom-2-pack-sampler-f-s-product.textcontent_u2d43zazabi_html:
We created TROOV for performance.
It‚Äôs that simple.
We use effective dosages of ingredients specifically chosen because they make a difference when it comes to efficiency, endurance, fatigue, and performance.
ecom-2-pack-sampler-f-s-product.textcontent_rzkt7wlvms_html: We made a functional beverage that‚Äôs actually full of real ingredients as close to how they‚Äôre found in nature as possible. Real vegetables, ripe fruits, natural teas. No synthetics.
ecom-2-pack-sampler-f-s-product.textcontent_zy1kfe77kjd_html: Caffeine + Anti-aging. An incredible source of polyphenols (250 mg), green tea is a powerful antioxidant that protects cells from degeneration and oxidation. It‚Äôs like it improves the life of each individual cell by being present. We use green tea primarily as a source of slow-release caffeine (125 mg) because we want to give you energy without the crash. It‚Äôs able to do this because of naturally occurring L-Theanine, an amino acid that crosses the blood-brain barrier that binds with receptors, firing up the neuron. It‚Äôs also a great source of EGCG, a well-researched catechin that boosts mental performance and lipid metabolism.
ecom-2-pack-sampler-f-s-product.textcontent_5oasjj02h7c_html: Nitrates + Bioavailability. We use fermented beetroot because fermentation reduces the naturally occurring sugar found in beets, making the bioactives (in this case, the nitrates) even more bioavailable. The nitrates found in beets work similar to L-Citrulline, turning them into nitrites. When these hit your gut, your body converts them into nitrous oxide, dilating your blood vessels so that you‚Äôll have more blood pumping without increasing your blood pressure. Better performance, no negative impact.
ecom-2-pack-sampler-f-s-product.textcontent_bkrtg1grvtv_html: Increased Efficiency. An amino acid, L-Citrulline supports exercise efficiency by improving muscle strength (through BCAA absorption), endurance, and recovery. We found that, by including a naturally occurring source of L-Citrulline, we‚Äôre able to support increased blood flow to the muscles, reducing muscle soreness, and supporting protein synthesis. In other words, it helps you perform better and recover faster.
ecom-2-pack-sampler-f-s-product.textcontent_kcvfebl6cj_html: Adaptogenic Synergy. Grown and cultivated in the Central Highlands of Peru, maca root is an adaptogenic herb used to create balance in the body, improve stamina, and enhance strength. Often consumed to manage environmental stress, maca is best consumed over time for a compounding, cumulative effect.
ecom-2-pack-sampler-f-s-product.textcontent_qebojykqq3_html: An incredible source of Vitamin C‚Äîa known force when it comes to reducing the risk of heart disease and stroke in the body. Lemons also have many compounds that may prevent cancer, protect against anemia, and help to regulate a healthy weight.
ecom-2-pack-sampler-f-s-product.headingtext_zvepeaatcm_html: The whole is greater than the sum of its parts...
ecom-2-pack-sampler-f-s-product.textcontent_3teadmkuqak_html: and that's certainly the case with TROOV. Intelligently designed with an intimate understanding of the body and its systems, TROOV‚Äôs ingredients work together to create, sustain, and prolong that sweet spot where energy meets performance.

onboarding.blog_excerpt: Your store hasn‚Äôt published any blog posts yet. A blog can be used to talk about new product launches, tips, or other news you want to share with your customers. You can check out Shopify‚Äôs ecommerce blog for inspiration and advice for your own store and blog.
